title: These 3 Tech Giants Will Crash in the Next Downturn
text: By Robert Ross, author of “The Sin Stock Anomaly: Collect Big, Safe Profits with These 3 Hated Stocks” Some of your “safe” stocks aren’t as safe as you might think. And now is a good time to sell them.

title: ESG Investing: Is Facebook a Responsible Investment?
text: If you’re searching for a feel-good stock, see how Facebook, the king of social media, scores on The Motley Fool’s ESG framework.

title: Facebook Stock Will Trend Higher as FB’s Advertising Revenue Grows
text: As its user monetization increases, FB has ample scope for revenue upside. As a result, FB stock should rally in the long-term.

title: Google, Facebook, Amazon and Apple told to turn over internal documents
text: The US government’s investigations into big tech widened on Friday as lawmakers announced they were seeking internal documents from Google, Facebook, Amazon and Apple.

title: Facebook's (FB) Focus on Local News to Aid Market Share
text: Facebook's (FB) Today In reflects its efforts to penetrate smaller cities in the United States in a bid to boost its market share.

title: The Wall Street Journal: House lawmakers request Apple, Facebook emails in antitrust probe
text: Congress is ramping up its probe into the tech industry, with House lawmakers demanding emails and executive communications from four technology giants as they look for evidence of anticompetitive behavior.

title: House antitrust probe of Big Tech seeks documents from Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Google
text: Congressional investigators on Friday called on Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google to produce a sweeping list of financial records and business documents, opening a new chapter in a "top-to-bottom" antitrust review of the tech industry.

title: Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google told to hand over documents for House antitrust probe
text: Lawmakers continue to amp up the pressure on tech companies.

title: House Antitrust Panel Seeks Documents From 4 Big Tech Firms
text: Lawmakers investigating Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google for possible antitrust violations on Friday sent the companies detailed requests for information.

title: House committee asks Facebook, Amazon, Apple and Alphabet to turn over documents in antitrust probe
text: Leaders of the House Judiciary Committee requested documents from four major tech companies, the committee announced Friday.

title: EU should refuse the development of Facebook's libra; Bruno Le Maire
text: French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire discusses Facebook's proposed cryptocurrency libra.

title: Wish.com: Facebook ads target teens with drug dealing equipment
text: Teenagers in the UK are among those being targeted with adverts for commonly used drug dealing equipment on Facebook.
